LanguageData.ColonistGroups_GameStartHelp_prt2:
The keys 6, 7, 8, 9 can be used to define groups and positions.
Use them like this:
Draft the colonists you want to define the group or position for and place them at their target positions. Now select who you want in this group, and press SHIFT+6 (for group 1).
The positions of your drafted and selected colonists are now saved to this group.
To recall the positions just press 6. This can be done for the keys 6, 7, 8 and 9.

Note: If the group mode (switch: SHIFT+0) is active, they will only be selected.
In this mode they won't go to any saved positions.

There are two more groups who are not assigned any keys yet. These groups (green icons) can be used to mark/select buildings.
LanguageData.ColonistGroups_GameStartHelp_prt3:
Key 0 has two functions:
If pressed once, your drafted colonists who don't have an active job, will be undrafted.
Secondly press SHIFT+0 to switch the recall mode (6-9) between POSITION and GROUP.

Furthermor there is BACKSPACE.
With BACKSPACE the camera will jump randomly into your homezone.
This is a kind of goto-colony-button.

All key bindings can be changed in the keybinding dialog.
